option.name: toggle_window_key
option.long: Toggle filtering for currently focused window.

option.name: toggle_screen_key
option.long: Toggle filtering for every window on the screen.

option.name: switch_filter_key
option.long: Select filter to use from filters list : either apply all filters or only one specific filter (triggering this action switches filters one by one and eventually comes back to the "all filters" mode).

option.name: filters
option.long: List of plain text filter files that should be applied when filtering windows or screen.

option.name: filter_decorations
option.long: Window decorations (borders and titlebar) will be filtered as well as window contents if enabled.

option.name: filter_match
option.long: Windows to be filtered by default.
